attributes.action: Stop our only bank in Todmorden from closing. Halifax bank
attributes.additional_details: Allow us to start a further petition to try and save this facility
attributes.background: Consider not closing our only bank in todmorden. Todmorden is full of a generation who do not have the facility for online banking or would not like to have their financial arrangements this way

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual banks.
